baseSupply().details: use this any time you need to query supply

auditReserves().notice: takes inventory of all tracked assetsalways consolidate to recognized reserves before audit

baseSupply().notice: returns supply metric that cannot be manipulated by debt

deposit(uint256,address,uint256).notice: allow approved address to deposit an asset for RIP

excessReserves().notice: returns excess reserves not backing tokens

incurDebt(uint256,address).notice: allow approved address to borrow reserves

manage(address,uint256).notice: allow approved address to withdraw assets

mint(address,uint256).notice: mint new RIP using excess reserves

repayDebtWithRIP(uint256).notice: allow approved address to repay borrowed reserves with RIP

repayDebtWithReserve(uint256,address).notice: allow approved address to repay borrowed reserves with reserves

withdraw(uint256,address).notice: allow approved address to burn RIP for reserves
